item.title: Donkey Kong Bananza: How to See Hidden Objects in Terrain
item.description:
Donkey Kong Bananza's destructible terrain is one of its best features, but it also makes tracking down every last collectible all the more daunting. Now that items can be hidden beneath the ground and tunneling is so crucial to the navigation of some areas, figuring out where to dig can seem near impossible.

Fortunately, players of Donkey Kong Bananza can make use of DK's Hand Slap ability for more than just item collection, as it also doubles as a handy sonar. When used, objects within your range will be highlighted, even through solid terrain, so making good use of this ability can make it much easier to find Banandium Gems and Fossils. It will also reveal chests, though as these appear randomly this isn't quite as helpful.

How to Use Sonar in Donkey Kong Bananza

While it's easy to overlook early on, DK actually begins the game with a Sonar ability that can reveal objects buried inside the terrain. This Sonar is triggered by performing the Hand Slap, which also grabs any nearby items, and will cause a glowing outline of any buried objects within range to become visible, albeit briefly. This is very helpful for locating Banandium Gems, Fossils, and the entrances to any challenges. Unfortunately, the Sonar initially has a very short range, making it less than helpful for locating objects outside your immediate vicinity.

You can upgrade DK's Sonar in the Skill Tree via the "Better Sonar" ability, which will increase DK's Sonar range substantially with each rank purchased, culminating in a 160% range boost when maxed out. You can further raise DK's Sonar while he's in Kong Bananza by equipping Pauline with a Lagoon Vest, acquired in exchange for Fossils at the Lagoon Layer's Style Shop. While limited to Kong Bananza, this can still be a hugely helpful upgrade when trying to explore difficult areas, especially since Kong Bananza is so good at tearing through the terrain.

DK's Sonar will highlight Banandium Gems, Fossils, and Challenge Entrances. It will also show treasure chests and any Banandium Chips in the immediate vicinity, which can sometimes be helpful too.

Donkey Kong Bananza
8.0 /10
Released
July 17, 2025

item.title: Lost Sword Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Lost Sword has everything you would expect from a mobile anime RPG. The game offers players a fascinating story, many battles, various events, and most importantly, dozens of different characters. Each of them has unique abilities, as well as backstories, so you will definitely want to get them all in your collection, although it requires investing a lot of resources. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to get extra goodies using Lost Sword codes.

Codes grant players various valuable rewards, among which you will even find Diamonds and Summon Tickets. But hurry, as their validity is limited.

All Lost Sword Codes

Working Lost Sword Codes

  • LTSDTHXHALF – Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • LSSCTVTHX2025 – Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • GRANDLAUNCH – Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • LOST0717JULY – Redeem this code to get free rewards

Expired Lost Sword Codes

There are no expired codes in Lost Sword . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

As befits a Gacha RPG, Lost Sword has many game modes and events where players can use their units. The larger your collection, the more powerful and diverse teams you can create. Moreover, each character requires an investment of resources to achieve maximum power. However, even to summon half of all units, you will have to either grind a lot or donate. If you want to save your money and time, then Lost Sword codes are just what you need.

Most codes contain several rewards, including currencies and consumables. Players can even get Summon Tickets from them for both characters and pets. However, codes expire after a certain time, so you should use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Lost Sword Codes

Using Lost Sword codes is not much different from most other mobile RPGs. Fortunately, the game has an intuitive interface. If this is your first time with Gacha RPGs, just follow these simple steps to get your free goodies:

  • Launch Lost Sword .
  • Next, click on the button with three stripes in the upper right corner and go to Settings.
  • Next, go to Account and select the Redeem Coupon option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click Redeem to claim the reward.

How to Get More Lost Sword Codes

The developers often add new codes to Lost Sword along with the release of new updates or banners. So you will want to visit their official pages to get all the news first-hand:

  • Official Lost Sword Discord server
  • Official Lost Sword X page
  • Official Lost Sword Facebook page

Lost Sword is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Marvel Rivals: All Summer Skins & How to Get Them
item.description:
In Marvel Rivals , one of the largest appeals that keeps players invested is the numerous cosmetic skin concepts for the playable heroes in-game. These skins are available for players to obtain in several different ways, including themed events and mission rewards, purchases from the in-game shop, gifts from other players, Twitch drops, and more.

During Marvel Rivals Season 3, the Summer Special event was launched. This event involves an array of different beachy and summer-themed collectibles and rewards, such as sprays, nameplates, emojis, mood bundles, and even five different cosmetic skins. If you're wondering which heroes are the lucky recipients of these concepts or how you can obtain them in-game, both of these matters have been outlined in the guide below.

All Summer Skins & How to Get Them in Marvel Rivals

The Summer Special event is available for a limited time in Marvel Rivals between July 17 and August 15 . With the arrival of this in-game opportunity, five different skins were released for various characters on the roster, seeing them dressed up in summer aesthetics with beachy swimwear.

However, not all of these skins are available to obtain through the same methods. For this reason, more details regarding each skin and relevant bundle items, as well as how players can acquire them, have been detailed below.

item.title: Roblox: Midnight Game Show Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Midnight Game Show offers players an exciting puzzle in the style of an escape room. The peculiarity of the game is the need for two players, since each puzzle can only be solved by working in a team. Upon successful completion of the rooms, you will earn Cash. But in this guide, we will tell you about a way to earn extra Cash in just a couple of clicks, namely using Midnight Game Show codes.

As befits Roblox codes, they contain various valuable goodies from the developers. And some of them will even reward you with up to 500 Cash, so you definitely do not want to miss them.

All Midnight Game Show Codes

Working Midnight Game Show Codes

  • SHOWTIME – Redeem this code to get free 500 Cash
  • 1MVISITS – Redeem this code to get free 500 Cash

Expired Midnight Game Show Codes

There are no expired codes in Midnight Game Show . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

At first, it is quite difficult for players to progress, as each challenge has unique rules in Midnight Game Show . But even after you get used to all of them, there will still be a lot of fun. This is because you can buy different items for Cash. Some of them can be fun, while others will bring chaos during the challenges. But, it is worth noting that the prices in the store are quite high, so you will need a lot of money. And Midnight Game Show codes will help you with this.

These Roblox codes are a great source of free money. Even a few of them will be enough to earn more than 1000 Cash. However, after some time after the release, each code expires. And if you do not manage to redeem them before this, the rewards will no longer be available.

How to Redeem Midnight Game Show Codes

Now that you know what goodies Midnight Game Show codes grant you, you should learn how to use them. It's super easy to do, as the redeeming option is no different from most other Roblox experiences. All you need to do is follow these steps:

  • First, launch Midnight Game Show .
  • Next, open the perks menu by clicking on the corresponding button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the field and click on the check mark to receive the rewards.

If you do everything correctly and the code is still active, you will see a message about receiving the rewards. We also recommend you copy and paste the codes to avoid typos.

How to Get More Midnight Game Show Codes

The developers release new codes for the Midnight Game Show when players reach certain community milestones, such as likes. So you should visit their official social media pages. There, the developers post all the news about upcoming updates, including fresh codes first of all:

  • Official Crimson Exit Discord server
  • Official Crimson Exit Roblox group

item.title: New Game With Stellar Reviews Has You Solving Your Own Murder
item.description:
A new indie game called The Drifter is now out, with its initial wave of reviews being nothing short of stellar. A pixel art point-and-click adventure, the title has received praise on numerous fronts, including its compelling hook that has players taking control of a character trying to solve his own murder.

The Drifter is developed by Powerhoof, an indie studio operating out of Melbourne, Australia. It was designed, written, and coded by Dave Lloyd, an industry veteran whose love for point-and-click adventures dates back to the early 2000s, when he was making such titles with the Adventure Game Studio engine. The Drifter has been in the works since 2017, though it didn't enter full production until four years later.

Following eight years' worth of development, The Drifter was released on July 17. It is currently only available for PC—via Steam and GOG—though Powerhoof is also working on a Nintendo Switch port. While the game will regularly retail for $19.99, it materialized with a 15% launch discount, bringing it down to $16.99. This promotional offer is set to run until July 31. Powerhoof offered a limited-time demo of The Drifter during the June 2025 edition of Steam Next Fest. However, the trial version of the game has since been removed and does not appear to be returning.

Where to Buy The Drifter

  • Steam
  • GOG

Two days after its release, The Drifter holds a "Mighty" rating on OpenCritic, with an average score of 86 and a 93% reviewer recommendation rate. This puts it in the 96th percentile of all the games scored on the aggregator platform, in addition to making it one of the highest-rated point and click titles in recent memory. Critics praised The Drifter for its compelling narrative, intoxicating atmosphere, and a consistent collection of puzzles that are challenging but never illogical, among other qualities. The game's soundtrack and voice acting have also elicited widespread compliments from critics. Early player feedback appears to match this largely favorable critical reception, with The Drifter currently holding 87.54% positive reviews on Steam, qualifying it for Valve’s “Very Positive” rating.

The Unity Engine-powered game still hasn't generated massive commercial momentum, though it's not doing too badly for an indie release. According to SteamDB data, The Drifter peaked at 445 concurrent Steam players on July 19, and is currently ranked 148th on Valve's "Top Sellers" list, which tracks all recent in-game revenue, including outright purchases, microtransactions, and subscriptions.

The Switch port of the pulpy sci-fi adventure game is currently without a concrete release date. However, Powerhoof previously confirmed that it's planning to bring The Drifter to the eShop before the end of 2025, so sometime in the next five months.
